text: Tumhi tya lokanci doki thecanyasathi ka tayara hota nahi, jyanni apalya sapatha toduna takalya ani (antima) paigambarala desabahera ghalavinyacya vicarata ahe, ani svatahca pahilyanda tyanni tumaci cheda kadhali ahe. Kaya tumhi tyanna bhita? Vastutah allahalaca sarvanta jasta hakka ahe ki tumhi tyace bhaya rakhave, jara tumhi imanadharaka asala
